content: Hi, it looks like we have two code systems for patient-to-subscriber relationship codes: one is referenced from Coverage.relationship https://www.hl7.org/fhir/valueset-subscriber-relationship.html and another is listed here: http://hl7.org/fhir/codesystem-relationship.html . Which one is considered as current, which one do we use? Why there are two of them anyway?
@Paul Knapp this is a FM question. What is going on here?

The codes referenced from Coverage.relationship are to be used, the other codesystem is an unreferenced and unused representation of the V3 codeset which should be removed in the next version of the spec.
